REVIEWS

Review by - Yelp

Scott E:

This place has real Indian food, and it is fresh and delicious. Best I have had in Charleston by far. Very good, great, scrumptious. People come here to dine from far away regularly -- that is how good it is.

Review by - Yelp

Kenny S:

My wife and I went to Naan tonight and we were not disappointed one bit! The restaurant itself is super cool and has a modern hipsterish vibe to it with a very cool bar right by the entrance. The waitstaff was super attentive with multiple people checking in on us at different times making sure everything was alright without being overbearing

Review by - Yelp

Holli A:

My daughter talked me into eating here, as it was my first time ever eating Indian cuisine. I wasn't sure what to order so we just got the buffet. Everything I tried was really good and I was impressed.

Review by - Yelp

Joanne B:

We ate dinner here and everything was amazing. We had Chicken 65 for an appetizer. It was full of flavor, tender and just a little spicy. We had Seekh Kebab and Dal Makhani. Both were tasty and perfectly prepared. The service was spot-on and the restaurant is so clean! Everyone was very nice. Also, order the garlic naan.
